response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is designed to significantly enhance productivity and streamline operations in your business. This solution has been meticulously crafted to address common challenges faced by companies in your industry. Given its unique features and comprehensive capabilities, we believe it's worth more than its face value. Considering its intrinsic value and the benefits it can bring to your organization, I am extending this exclusive opportunity to acquire it for $15,000. We're confident that this investment will pay off in terms of efficiency gains and cost savings. Let's discuss how we can make this valuable asset work for you.", "product_price": 15000}
